text: Mario Bonomo (born 25 January 1912, date of death unknown) was an Italian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Asiago
title: Mario Bonomo
